3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent wall geometry and isometric viewing angle; clearly defined interior volumes.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room count and adjacency match perfectly. External garage footprint and internal hallway partitions are accurate. One minor distortion in the master bath area.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture is well-placed and logical (bed in bedrooms, car in garage, kitchen counters). Bathroom fixtures are visible.

visual_clarity.notes: Good lighting. Points deducted for text contamination on the floor surface (E6-UI).

detected_errors.description: Ghosted text from the floor plan is visible on the 3D floor surfaces.
Some window openings are rendered as solid wall indentations rather than transparent panes.

summary: A highly faithful 3D transformation that accurately preserves the complex layout and room relationships of the original architectural plan.
